extendedInfo.description: bpresso.com is a blood pressure management app. You can log you blood pressure, pulse, weight, medicines taken, sport activities and notes. All this data are updated to you web account where you can analyze, check, print and export to .csv file (log book)Alarms and reminders can inform you about planed tests or activites.DETAILS:- The input of the necessary data is very easy and will not take you longer than few seconds- All the data registered on your mobile phone is transferred to and updated on your online account - Through this account your data can be easily accessed and analyzed with graphs- Everyday plans with alarms remind you about activities to do. - Supported languages: English,  PolishKeywords:blood pressure, blood pressure management, pulse, pressure log, blood pressure control, bp, bp  tracker, blood pressure diary, hypertension, hypertension management

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I installed it a couple of days ago and so far it is exactly what I was looking for.  You can enter several different readings through-out the day, it works great and - the most important part- it works with and syncs with website so I am not bound to my phone.  The UI on the phone is great though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Not user friendly. You have to register before you can use and it does nothing. Looks like you have to manually take your own bp
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t set up
reviews.comment: It asked what b.p. meds I\'m on...I entered \"none\", and it seemed not to allow that answer in that field, so wouldn\'t let me set up. I\'m confused. What did I do wrong? Uninstall. Sorry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yuck
reviews.comment: Who needs all this hand holding? You have to \"register\" to use the app. Registration kept failing so I had to complete the activation using a notebook computer because the dialogs on the phone were too small to read, never mind fill in. When I expanded the screen so I could read it, it exploded to such a large size it was impossible to use.The charts that are supposed to be there - aren\'t. The option to send data to ANYwhere also isn\'t there. There are better apps that don\'t force you to do it their way, they just enable you to record your BP - what a concept. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t regirster
reviews.comment: I simply can not register. Neither via web nor via mobile app. That\'s the problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks great, just can\'t get registered
reviews.comment: This program looks like it has a TON of possibilities. I was looking forward to using it but after the inability to get registered I have given up. I have wrote the support email that they provide but without any answers. I have given up and now have uninstalled it from my phone and am looking for a new program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Synching
reviews.comment: Stopped synching. Used to be good.
reviews.author: Mike Bryan

reviews.comment: After several tries to register only ERROR-MSGS!\n...SHAME :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I need it. I love the online Sync feature. My doctor liked the Chart.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy W
reviews.comment: Why i can\'t get the graph?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This is just the blood pressure app that I was looking for. I love the cloud.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: no registration
reviews.comment: I cannot get registered and they will not respond to service request.
reviews.author: Charles Williams

reviews.title: BROKEN ! !
reviews.comment: Registration screen is basically non-functional.  If you want to encourage people to download this app....please make sure it works seamlessly and trouble free.  No one wants to mess around too much with this hoop-jumping.....especially if it doesnt work.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Ken Mason

reviews.title: Has potential, ...but registration could be better
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t get registered, no reaction on my e-mail (nope, ...not in my SPAM-folder either). Sorry, I\'ve chosen another app
reviews.author: Rene van Mook
